description: Gigi Hadid shared photos from NMACC opening as she posed with Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Shah Rukh Khan.
title: Salman Khan, Shehnaaz Gill, Alia Bhatt: 11 celebrity photos you should not miss today

images.caption: Gigi Hadid shared photos from NMACC opening as she posed with Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Shah Rukh Khan. (Photo: Gigi Hadid/Instagram)

Gauri Khan shared her photos from NMACC opening and wrote, "Celebrating the best of Indian fashion at #NMACC. Chose this beautiful necklace called ‘A Playful Meander’ from Zoya’s magnificent collection Beyond - a lovely example of the best of Indian craftsmanship translated into contemporary design. Zoya celebrates the feminine with panache. Diamonds and emeralds are crowned with a 12 carat morganite to show the moods of the mighty Indus. A nice complement to the beautiful sari by Manish Malhotra." (Photo: Gauri Khan/Instagram)
Kajal Aggarwal posted photos with her husband Gautam Kitchlu and called him '#dateforlife'. (Photo: Kajal Aggarwal/Instagram)
Shibani Akhtar shared photos with her husband Farhan Akhtar. (Photo: Shibani Akhtar/Instagram)
Shehnaaz Gill took her Instagram stories to post a photo which seem to be from this year's Holi party. (Photo: Shehnaaz Gill/Instagram)
Salman Khan shared his latest picture. (Photo: Salman Khan/Instagram)
Sharing a set of photos, Sonakshi Sinha wrote, "I think i found the ‘lootera’ wala tree… but there was no last leaf this time 😂." (Photo: Sonakshi Sinha/Instagram)
Shraddha Kapoor shared photos with her pet and wrote, "Aao Shyloh ko bohot saara pyaar dete hain ❤️Happy 14th Birthday to the love of my life My Chota Babu 😘🥰😍." (Photo: Shraddha Kapoor/Instagram)
Our photographer spotted Alia Bhatt on the move in Mumbai. (Photo: Varinder Chawla)
Malaika Arora clicked at Diva Yoga in Bandra. (Photo: Varinder Chawla)
Bharti Singh and her husband Haarsh Limbachiyaa hosted a bash for son Laksh's first birthday. (Photo: Varinder Chawla)
